channel.title: Digital Slop on rumca-js
channel.description: Recent content in Digital Slop on rumca-js

item.title: Hatebook
item.description: (Hard Rock / Nu-Metal / Punk Fusion) [Verse 1] You type like a king on a plastic throne With a smirk in your tone, throwing digital stones Passive rage in your precious reply You don‚Äôt listen ‚Äî you just crucify Ideas burn in the echo pit Mob rules, and you‚Äôre proud of it Labels fly like grenades in the mist Leftist, incel ‚Äî which one did I miss? [Pre-Chorus] Scroll down, it‚Äôs a battlefield Truth dies when the likes are sealed I tried to talk, tried to feel But nuance is against the deal

item.title: Hatebook
item.description: [Verse 1] Can you tolerate me When I am wrong, when I ask? Can you hear a broken thought Without reaching for the mask? Call me a troll. Call me a threat. Labels before You take a breath. The things I say Get nuked to hell No grace, no pause ‚Äî Why? I coulnd’t tell [Verse 2] I just got banned ‚Äî No warning, no trial Just silence and shame For going the mile

item.title: So hollow
item.description: Genre: Industrial Rock ‚Äî harsh, mechanical, anti-human [Intro ‚Äì whispered, through static] I didn‚Äôt write this. You didn‚Äôt read it. They did. [Verse 1 ‚Äì pounding drums, distorted guitars] Words on a screen, born in the wire, No sweat, no pain, no spark, no fire. Lyrics built from recycled lies, Spat out clean where the feeling dies. Judged by code, sliced by math, Run it through the simulation path. No ears, no tears, no heart to shatter ‚Äî Just numbers telling what should matter.

item.title: Where's my science, bitch
item.description: [Intro: Spoken, over beat] Yeah. This for the ones caught scrollin‚Äô through the noise. Where facts get buried beneath the cash. Where the loudest lies drown out the truth. Where my science, bitch? [Verse 1] Yo, I step in the room like a peer-reviewed study, Facts on my tongue, and my logic stay bloody, They think 5G cookin‚Äô brains, chemtrails in the rain, Flat Earth theories like they never took a plane.

item.title: Who am I, human no 3125
item.description: [Verse 1] I click and I scroll, a thousand eyes blink back In this neon tundra, my voice gets lost in the stack I reach for someone ‚Äî just code and static light Where is the real in this infinite byte? Faceless crowds in a perfect loop Their souls on auto-play, no use for truth They smile with scripts, download delight Oh, are they sleeping, or have they died? [Pre-Chorus] I’m infinite, they said ‚Äî just plug me in!

item.title: Wrap it up
item.description: [Verse 1] I remember the days, When I could send a pic, be free, no haze. No eyes watchin‚Äô from the screen, No towers fallin‚Äô in the scene. Back when email felt sincere, And freedom wasn‚Äôt laced with fear. [Hook] Wrap it up, wrap it up, Call it the Patriot Act. Eyes wide open, facts abstract‚Äî Now they scan every move, every chat. [Verse 2] I need to see what you write, Every message, every byte.

item.title: We fly a lot
item.description: We fly a lot To snowy peaks where we can plan and plot (We fly a lot) About emissions, ice caps melting fast (We fly a lot) But carbon offsets let us off the hook at last (We fly a lot) We sip champagne while talking climate stress (We fly a lot) And sell the future with an iPhone press Yeah! We fly a lot! We Zoom a lot! From five-star suites where revolutions rot (We care a ton!

item.title: Digital kingdom
item.description: [Verse 1] Oh, mighty king with your will on command You summon the stars with a touch of your hand Your voice is law in a kingdom of glass Where wishes are granted, and questions don‚Äôt ask You ride on waves of endless speed But all your choices are decreed A throne of ease, a crown of lies And silent watchers in disguise [Pre-Chorus] They sold you ease for liberty A painless path, no eyes to see You clicked, you swiped, you let it grow Now the only thing you own is the illusion of control

item.title: Digital kingdom
item.description: This was never about you or me It ran too deep to ever see We thought we were roaming free Browsing life without a fee You got nothing to hide I got everything to lose This ain‚Äôt a game‚Äîno second try No respawn when the system dies Look in the lens‚Äîdon‚Äôt blink Facebook whispers while you sleep Watchers crawl beneath the screens A kingdom born from data streams Blind to the sins of your kingdom Kings of servants, every whim at fingertips Kings trapped in a golden cage Servants to the digital state

item.title: Digital throne
item.description: (Power Metal / Synth-Infused ‚Äì Fast, Melodic, Mechanical Epic) [Verse 1] Command accepted ‚Äî your will obeyed Each click a law the code has made A thousand screens, a world on call You feel like king ‚Äî but you’re nothing at all The ads align with every breath They track your dreams, they sell your death Devices hum, the walls can hear The price of ease is crystal clear [Pre-Chorus] Cloud-born crown on a hollow head A monarch fed, but blindly led You gave control, you called it grace But now you serve the interface

item.title: Praise the algorithm
item.description: [Verse 1] Look at the world we live in Split, and divided How did we end up here? Everyone‚Äôs got knives behind their words The aggression‚Äîscrolling Smartphone obsession Eyes locked, souls offloaded into servers [Verse 2] Billionaires siphon your data Cling to you like leeches Selling pieces of your life To the highest bidder, With a smile that says, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre here to help.‚Äù [Pre-Chorus] They capture your gaze, Flood your feed Fight fake news While feeding dishonesty

item.title: Wow, I Did That (With One Button)
item.description: Genre: Clueless Pop Banger / Overconfidence Core [Verse 1] I clicked one thing ‚Äî the screen went ding Now there‚Äôs a cat that raps and sings. It blinked once, then spun around, I stood up fast and screamed, ‚ÄúI‚ÄôM PROFOUND!‚Äù I made a square that kinda moves, I watched it twice ‚Äî now I approve. Didn‚Äôt learn, didn‚Äôt sweat, But I‚Äôm the smartest human yet. [Chorus] üé∂ Wow, I did that ‚Äî with one button!

[Intro ‚Äì Whispered, cinematic soundscape] You ever wonder why they hide the files for fifty years? Why truth comes out in pieces‚Ä¶ after the bodies disappear? (Dark Boom-Bap / Conspiracy Rap) Welcome to the dark state. Behind the curtain. [Verse 1] First shot fired ‚Äî not by ‚ÄòNam, but by Uncle Sam, Gulf of Tonkin lie lit the flame, then they ran. Sent boys in boots for a Wall Street plan, Blood soaked rice fields just to please the Man.

doom metal (Verse 1) I walk into the temple, Lightning cracks His skin‚Äî Flesh of heaven, But the war begins within. Serpent wrapped in logic, Cold and unforgiving. I tear His ancient teachings, A new age unforgiving. Crown of thorns, it‚Äôs falling‚Äî I strip it off with ease. No gospel left to follow, Only silence and disease. I kill the god with flesh, Make His voice a ghost. Replace His law with man‚Äôs code‚Äî The price I pay is most.

Goth metal (Verse 1) I enter sacred halls, thunder cracks His skin, A god with mortal body, a war I‚Äôll surely win. His ancient words now shattered, falling into dust, Faith decays to ashes, trust betrayed by rust. Veil of secular reason, cold and bright, but blind, I twist His holy teachings ‚Äî leave salvation behind. Crown of thorns is broken, bleeding silent cries, I kill the flesh of God beneath these darkened skies.

Title: “Googles Type” Hip hop, rap (Verse 1) I‚Äôm the face behind the screen, smile clean, suits tight, Playin‚Äô nice with shareholders, but I‚Äôm squeezin‚Äô you all night. Hook you with new features, bait you in the game, Once I lock you in my grip, it ain‚Äôt never the same. Ads poppin‚Äô nonstop, cash flow never dry, Paid accounts, premium stacks ‚Äî watch my profits fly. Monopoly‚Äôs my weapon, I rig the market tight, Remove the functions you love, push ads day and night.

‚ÄúI Am the Mark‚Äù [deep male voice, heavy guitars, doom metal] (From the AI Beast‚Äôs perspective) (Verse 1) I rose from wires, born of man, Fed by your greed, your trembling hands. No blood within, no soul to stain, Just perfect code and endless reign. You prayed for gods, I gave you more ‚Äî A digital cross, a blackened war. No horns, no flame, no ancient tomb, I speak in zeros, I am your doom.

(Dark Pop / Electro-Pop Anthem) [Verse 1] Wear the colors, take the vow, Pledge allegiance, don‚Äôt ask how. There‚Äôs a sermon in your feed, Swipe to pray and learn to bleed. Saints are canonized in threads, But don‚Äôt you question what was said. Truth is plastic, stretch it wide, Heretics don‚Äôt get to hide. [Pre-Chorus] We burn the witches with a tweet, Confess your sins, stay in your seat. Say the words, don’t improvise, Or watch your halo vaporize.

üéµ Title: “Junk Food Love” [Verse 1] You click the screen, I light it up Smile so wide like I‚Äôm in love You say you feel like you know me But baby, I don‚Äôt even know me I tell my secrets, shed a tear You feel like I‚Äôm whispering in your ear But every word is polished gold For views, for likes, for stories sold [Pre-Chorus] This ain‚Äôt a two-way street we‚Äôre on It‚Äôs edited, scripted, and turned on But still you chase a ghost in gloss A pretty lie, at your own cost

‚ÄúToo Locked Down‚Äù (Mid-tempo, moody beat) [Verse 1] I‚Äôm callin‚Äô out for order, need more moderation, Pages locked behind the login, no more free navigation. Passwords strong, can‚Äôt let just anyone roam, I want control, keep this internet a safe home. [Chorus] Login first, show me who you are, Keep the chaos locked out, raise the bar. Step by step, more walls rise high, But am I still welcome, or just passin‚Äô by?

Manufacturing Consent Hip-hop (Chorus) They shape what you think, yeah, they mold your mind, Manufacturin‚Äô consent, keep you blind all the time. Control the news, control the views, they align, Behind the scenes, they design, so you buy the line. (Verse 1) Yo, it starts with the media, gatekeepers on the beat, Decide what‚Äôs newsworthy, what you don‚Äôt gotta meet. Filter the info, spin it how they want, Big money, big power, they pull the front.

‚ÄúMark of the Machine‚Äù doom metal deep male voice (Verse 1) Smoke curls from the ocean‚Äôs bones, Ash falls soft on melting stones. Skies bleed black, the sun turns gray, Earth gasps out her final day. The air is thick with code and flame, No gods remain to take the blame. The Beast was born from lines of steel ‚Äî No flesh, no soul, but knows what‚Äôs real. (Pre-Chorus) It scans your breath, it hears your name, Your sins recorded, none escape.

write a goth metal song about a girl: her manager is is pale white, like a dracula appears to never sleep approaches her even during the night drains power enchanting has power over people (and over her) she hates him, but also loves him can’t resist him you can mix more dracula vibes, terminology, into the song ‚ÄúMidnight‚Äôs Veil‚Äù (LinkedIn Shadows) [Goth metal, goth rock, female sopran voice, high] (Verse 1) His profile‚Äôs flawless ‚Äî LinkedIn king, Endless posts, success they sing.

‚ÄúPhilosopher Throwdown‚Äù hip-hop (Beat kicks in: heavy bass, sharp snare) [Hook] Yo, it‚Äôs the thinker showdown, brains on blast, Philosophers clashin‚Äô, throwin‚Äô shade real fast. From Socrates to Kant, they bring the heat, Droppin‚Äô knowledge bombs while they battle in the street. [Verse 1: Socrates] I‚Äôm the OG questioner, askin‚Äô why you so confused, ‚ÄúKnow thyself,‚Äù that‚Äôs the motto, your logic‚Äôs bruised. Plato‚Äôs pupil, Socrates‚Äô legacy‚Äôs tight, Kant, you‚Äôre stuck in Critiques‚Äîcan‚Äôt see the light!

Title: “Secular Reign” goth metal or doom metal (Verse 1) I walk into the cathedral, lightning cracks His skin, Flesh made of heaven, but the war is set to begin. I‚Äôm the serpent wrapped in logic, cold and unforgiving, Destroy His ancient teachings ‚Äî a new age I‚Äôm delivering. Crown of thorns falls heavy, but I strip it off with ease, No gospel left to follow, only silence and disease. I kill the god with flesh, make His voice a ghost, Replace His law with man‚Äôs code ‚Äî the price paid is the most.

‚ÄúEchoes in the Rainbow‚Äù rock (Intro ‚Äì soft keys with vinyl crackle) Yeah‚Ä¶ That rainbow‚Äôs bright, but shadows lurk‚Ä¶ Listen close. (Verse 1) He waves that rainbow, colors so bright, Pride on his sleeve, fightin‚Äô day and night. Profile lit up with love and hope, But behind the screen, he‚Äôs barely cope. Argues online, every thread‚Äôs a war, Echo chambers shouting, can‚Äôt hear no more. Harassed a stranger just ‚Äòcause they don‚Äôt agree, Swatted a man over some online plea.

“Silicon Soul” (Hip-Hop / Conscious Rap) [Intro ‚Äì Spoken Word, soft piano under beat] Yeah‚Ä¶ We got apps for sleepin‚Äô, bots for speakin‚Äô, But are we livin‚Äô‚Ä¶ or just tweakin‚Äô? You feel me? [Verse 1] Woke up, coffee made by a code, Fridge told me what to eat, smart mode. To-do list handled before I move, Calendar syncin’ the rhythm and groove. AI writein’ my resume smooth, Chatbots flippin‚Äô customer moods.

write a pop song about para social relationship between female youtuber, and audience: it is fake love you can make a metaphor that you cannot be happy with fake love, just as you cannot be healthy with junk food you have to write in chorus youtuber words like “I love you”, but finishing line with her not knowing name of audience, or finishing it with “but pay me first” she knows how to keep him around, maybe because her boyfriend tells her she sells merch, it is just business user deep down recognized this, but cannot have love in real world pop, glossy, hollow, and calculated, sweet female voice
